Row.Text: Land trade routes originating from this city have a 50% increase in range and produce an additional 2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold when connecting to another civilization. Incoming Trade Routes will generate an extra 2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and 1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for the city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Boosts [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of Caravans and Cargo Ships by 50%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When a [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Land Trade Route originating here and targeting another Civ is completed, receive a [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism boost with that Civ based on your recent [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Nearby sources of [ICON_RES_TRUFFLES] Truffles, [ICON_RES_COTTON] Cotton, and [ICON_RES_FUR] Fur produce +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
Our people are now trading for your wax seals and wearing your fur cloaks. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.

The Ushkuinik are pirates and barbarians that plague our lands like... well, a plague. But they, too, are men, and all men have their weakness in gold. A generous donation to their cause should convince them to leave our empire free from the path of their pillaging for the time being.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Novgorod [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 {2_Resource} [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peace with Barbarians for this era

The Ushkuinik are pirates and barbarians that plague our lands like... well, a plague. But they, too, are men, and all men have their weakness in gold. A generous donation to their cause should convince them to leave our empire free from their rampaging for the time being.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peace with Barbarians for this era
Aleksandr Nevsky of Novgorod has struck peace with the barbaric Ushkuiniks.

Ivan's Hundred is an association of merchants who trade in wax wholesale. Their leaders are members of our ruling government and their trade brings Novgorod great prosperity. Patronising them would likely bolster our wealth considerably further.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Novgorod [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Medieval Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 {2_Resource} [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free Great Merchant [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+30% Great Merchant generation

Ivan's Hundred is an association of merchants who trade in wax wholesale. Their leaders are members of our ruling government, and their trade brings Novgorod great prosperity. Patronising them would likely bolster our wealth considerably further.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free Great Merchant [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+30% Great Merchant generation
The people of {1_CityName} have begun drinking a strange new concoction of sweet honey and beer! They call the drink: Medovukha.

The Veche has once again assembled and declared a new Posadnik to administer our great capital. Let us pray that Posadnik {1_BoyarName} shall continue Novgorod's legacy as a great and prospering city.[NEWLINE]
We wish him the best of luck.
A new Posadnik has been elected by the Veche to administer the capital city.

Our plans to construct a new fortress at Koporye, over which we would be sole ruler, have not been met with welcome by the people of {1_CityName}. Treacherously, a member of our court has sought to make use of this unrest and has summoned a horde of Barbarians with which he hopes to challenge our leadership. The horde, which clamours at the gates of the city of {2_CityName}, must be displaced.[NEWLINE]
We shall put our great wealth to pacify this terrible horde.
We must face this horde on the battlefield.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_CityName} goes into 2 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The Barbarian Horde is displaced[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_CityName} goes into 2 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Barbarian Horde surrounds {2_CityName}[ENDCOLOR]
We have managed to pay off a Barbarian horde hired by one of our treacherous Boyars seeking to displace us.
We have pledged to fend off a Barbarian horde hired by one of our treacherous Boyars seeking to displace us.
A Barbarian horde has been hired in the court of {1_LeaderName} in an effort to displace him as ruler of {2_CivName}. Unfortunately for the courtier, Nevsky's purse was deeper.
A Barbarian horde has been hired in the court of {1_LeaderName} in an effort to displace him as ruler of {2_CivName}. Nevksy has pledged to defeat them on the battlefield.
